stories.Title: Tesla aims for a wireless future
stories.Description: The company’s interest in Wiferion, a German startup known for its wireless charging solutions, hints at a new era of innovation in EV charging.
stories.Tweet: Tesla aims for a wireless future 📦 The company’s interest in Wiferion, a German startup known for its wireless charging solutions, hints at a new era of innovation in EV charging. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/06/21/tesla-looking-acquire-small-wireless-charging/

stories.Title: The better route for Rivian
stories.Description: The American automaker has made a strategic acquisition of Iternio, the minds behind A Better Route Planner app, with the goal of improving the driving experience in its EVs.
stories.Tweet: The better route for Rivian 📦 The American automaker has made a strategic acquisition of Iternio, the minds behind A Better Route Planner app, with the goal of improving the driving experience in its EVs. #rivian https://www.techtimes.com/articles/292902/20230621/rivian-acquires-iternio-maker-better-route-planner-app-integrate-navigation.htm

stories.Title: Betelgeuse, Betelgeuse, Betelgeuse
stories.Description: The destiny of this bright star sparks discussion among astronomers. While recent studies reveal an imminent grand finale, others argue for several hundred years before a potential supernova.
stories.Tweet: Betelgeuse, Betelgeuse, Betelgeuse 📦 The destiny of this bright star sparks discussion among astronomers. While recent studies reveal an imminent grand finale, others argue for several hundred years before a potential supernova. #space https://gizmodo.com/betelgeuse-won-t-go-supernova-decades-centuries-1850562077

stories.Title: From the stars to your phone
stories.Description: AST SpaceMobile and AT&T are taking a step forward in satellite connectivity. Their recent tests in Hawaii delivered download speeds of 10Mbps from the BlueWalker 3 satellite to ground smartphones.
stories.Tweet: From the stars to your phone 📦 AST SpaceMobile and AT&T are taking a step forward in satellite connectivity. Their recent tests in Hawaii delivered download speeds of 10Mbps from the BlueWalker 3 satellite to ground smartphones. #space https://www.engadget.com/cellular-satellite-test-successfully-beams-4g-data-from-space-to-a-regular-phone-200318927.html

stories.Title: AI’s degenerative process
stories.Description: There's a disturbing reality in the world of machine learning: Models that solely learn from each other face severe performance challenges due to the lack of genuine data.
stories.Tweet: AI’s degenerative process 📦 There's a disturbing reality in the world of machine learning: Models that solely learn from each other face severe performance challenges due to the lack of genuine data. #ai https://www.marktechpost.com/2023/06/21/ai-will-eat-itself-this-ai-paper-introduces-a-phenomenon-called-model-collapse-that-refers-to-a-degenerative-learning-process-where-models-start-forgetting-improbable-events-over-time/

stories.Title: A touch of AI for Toyota
stories.Description: Their latest breakthrough, a generative AI technique developed by the Toyota Research Institute, is aimed at revolutionizing the car design process.
stories.Tweet: A touch of AI for Toyota 📦 Their latest breakthrough, a generative AI technique developed by the Toyota Research Institute, is aimed at revolutionizing the car design process. #toyota https://electrek.co/2023/06/21/toyota-use-ai-to-maximize-future-ev-range/

stories.Title: MosaicML comes for OpenAI’s throne
stories.Description: The AI startup has introduced MPT-30B, a language model that showcases its commitment to accessibility. By reducing training costs, MosaicML is democratizing AI technology.
stories.Tweet: MosaicML comes for OpenAI’s throne 📦 The AI startup has introduced MPT-30B, a language model that showcases its commitment to accessibility. By reducing training costs, MosaicML is democratizing AI technology.  #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/mosaicml-challenges-openai-with-its-new-open-source-language-model/

stories.Title: Attention app developers!
stories.Description: Apple's visionOS software development kit is now available, loaded with the right tools to create immersive augmented and mixed reality apps for the anticipated Vision Pro headset.
stories.Tweet: Attention app developers! 📦 Apple's visionOS software development kit is now available, loaded with the right tools to create immersive augmented and mixed reality apps for the anticipated Vision Pro headset. #apple https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/06/apple-makes-visionos-sdk-available-to-developers-starting-today/

stories.Title: SpaceX's constellation is brighter than ever
stories.Description: The Starlink V2 Minis are now operational, transmitting data as part of SpaceX's vision for a more connected future.
stories.Tweet: SpaceX's constellation is brighter than ever 📦 The Starlink V2 Minis are now operational, transmitting data as part of SpaceX's vision for a more connected future. #spacex https://gizmodo.com/spacex-next-gen-starlink-satellites-sending-data-earth-1850561636

stories.Title: Code reading made easy
stories.Description: GitHub's commitment to developers shines through with its revolutionary Code View, designed to enhance your code reading and exploration experience.
stories.Tweet: Code reading made easy 📦 GitHub's commitment to developers shines through with its revolutionary Code View, designed to enhance your code reading and exploration experience. #programming https://github.blog/2023-06-21-crafting-a-better-faster-code-view/

stories.Title: This startup is defying gravity’s boundaries
stories.Description: Gravitilab's advancements in microgravity hold immense potential for space hardware testing. Their UAV and suborbital launch vehicle plan to revolutionize the already crowded space market.
stories.Tweet: This startup is defying gravity’s boundaries 📦 Gravitilab's advancements in microgravity hold immense potential for space hardware testing.
